Text: Thanks, Skadugangaz. The scan is clear and pretty clean. The book itself looks awfully cheap and kind of short though.
Indeed, not a bit better looking than any other New Age book, written by a middle aged self-proclaimed "guru" with an self-esteem too high. ;)
@Skadugangaz, you mention "The Golden Bough", and indeed there is a torrent here on tpb but unseeded. Would you mind uploading it?
Not a bad idea, I'll see if I find some good scan (or scan/OCR) of it. In the meantime, you could easily find several various scans if you just "Google it". :)

thank you for sharing this! i always wanted to have this book but was never able to buy it.

merci

Wow you are such a piece of shit!! I was going to download this but after reading what you wrote I decided not to cause I'd rather support Varg. And who the fuck are you exactly that makes you so fucking superior? And why upload this if you don't respect the author?? Fuck You

Ja ja! I'll tell you, VV is some character. He DENIES stabbing Oystein in the back (despite the evidence), and regarding black metal musicians, he says that they were and are "a bunch of wimps and losers who play heavy metal because they're incapable of doing anything else". He is reputed to be an ex-skinhead and a neo-nazi, is vocal about his admiration for Hitler and the Waffen-SS, is a racist and anti-semite and anti-social. Regarding humankind, he says that it would be a good idea to "line 99% of humanity against a wall and kill them all".  Who the 1% who would be spared he doesn't say.  You think you would be one of the lucky ones.
I agree that he doesn't deserve any money.  He trashes capitalism, bankers, jews, "greedy-pigs", the USA, etc, etc, etc!
Shall we say HYPOCRITE!?
